aiPreview.aiResponse: This could be leaf burn. Cut the damaged leaves...

footer.description: Created with the aim of accelerating digital transformation in agriculture and creating a reliable digital assistant for every farmer.

about.title: EcoGrow – Your Product's New Value Destination
about.paragraph1: A portion of the products grown by farmers reaches the markets, while the rest turns into food waste, increasing methane and CO₂ emissions. EcoGrow solves this problem: showcase your unsold products on our platform, find buyers, and promote them. At the same time, with the AI tools on our site, you can detect spoilage and pest risks in time, growing healthy, high-quality, and waste-free products.
about.paragraph2: EcoGrow – The new name of ecological innovation
about.paragraph3: At the same time, thanks to the AI tools on our website, detect decay and pest risks in time and grow healthy, quality and waste-free products.

contact.title: Contact Us

faqItems.q1: How does the AI assistant work?
faqItems.a1: Our AI assistant works based on artificial intelligence technology and answers farmers' questions about agriculture.
faqItems.a2: Basic services are free. Monthly subscription plans are available for premium features.
faqItems.a3: You can register through a simple process by entering the "Sign Up" section on our website.
